Data Loader

Tools for loading csv files containing polygon bounding box information.

class poly2pascal.data_loader.CSVLoader(csv_file_path: str, geometry_col: str = 'geometry')

Class with methods for loading csv files containing polygon bounding box information.

load_data() → GeoDataFrame

Load csv files containing polygon bounding box information.

Returns

DataFrame with bounding box and image information.

Return type

gpd.GeoDataFrame
